meanings.definition: A dive in which the front of the body strikes the water flat and belly first.
meanings.sent1: During the pool competition, his bellyflop made a big splash.
meanings.sent2: She winced as she watched the boy's painful bellyflop into the pool.
meanings.sent3: The bellyflop contest at the beach was both funny and painful to watch.
meanings.sent4: His attempt at a graceful dive turned into a bellyflop of embarrassment.
meanings.sent5: The loud smack of his bellyflop echoed across the pool area.

meanings.sent1: He decided to bellyflop into the water for fun.
meanings.sent2: Kids love to bellyflop when they play in the pool.
meanings.sent3: She warned him not to bellyflop, but he did it anyway and regretted it.
meanings.sent4: The daredevil bellyflopped off the diving board with a loud splash.
meanings.sent5: The clumsy diver always manages to bellyflop instead of diving gracefully.

meanings.definition: The sound made when someone bellyflops into water.
meanings.sent1: The bellyflop echoed through the quiet lake, startling the birds.
meanings.sent2: The lifeguard cringed at the unmistakable bellyflop noise from the high dive.
meanings.sent3: The synchronized swimmers incorporated the bellyflop sound into their routine for laughs.
meanings.sent4: The bellyflop noise was so loud, it could be heard from the other side of the pool.
meanings.sent5: The bellyflop sound always brings laughter from the spectators at the water park.
